short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A digital personal assistant - summarise your inbox!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get email smart with our AI 🤖 assistant. 
💪 Ditch inbox overload, 🔍 filter noise, and 📈 prioritize smarter.

Highlights:
🥷 Inbox ninja - breeze through unreads with a prioritized list.
🧵 Email gist - Say goodbye to lengthy email threads, get the point in seconds.
